kralVolumeterOmg.description: Madaidaicin KRAL VoluMeter OMG mita gudun ruwa mai kyau na screw tare da daidaitaccen auna auna. Yana fasalta maimaitawa mafi girma, sadarwa mai yawa, da takaddun shaida na MID don aikace-aikacen canja wurin tsaro.
features: Kewayon diamita: DN15 zuwa DN150 (1/2" zuwa 6")
Gudun ruwa: 0.5-1200 L/min (ya danganta da girman)
Multi-protocol: Fitowar bugun jini, 4-20mA, HART, Profibus
Haɗin aiki da yawa: Flanged (DIN, ANSI), Zare
Kayan aiki masu ƙarfi: Aluminium, Cast Steel, 316L SST
ATEX, IECEx, FM, CSA, MID sun yarda

flowTechnologyDcISeries.title: Flow Technology DC-I Series Mita Gudun Ruwa Mai Kyau na Helical Gear
flowTechnologyDcISeries.description: Ci-gaban Flow Technology DC-I Series mita gudun ruwa mai kyau na helical gear wanda aka ƙera don ruwa mai yawa. Yana fasalta ultra-wide viscosity range, daidaito na musamman, da kayan aiki na musamman don buƙatun aikace-aikacen kemikal da petrochemical.
features: Ƙananan kewayon diamita: DN6 zuwa DN50 (1/4" zuwa 2")
Ultra-wide gudun ruwa: 0.001-400 GPM (ya danganta da girman)
Haɗin aiki da yawa: Flanged (ANSI), NPT, BSP
Kayan aiki na musamman: 316 SST, Hastelloy C, PPS

danfossKp36.title: Danfoss KP36 Matsi Sauya
danfossKp36.description: Saukakawa matsa lamba na masana'antu tare da lambobin sadarwa na lantarki don aiki mai aminci a cikin tururi, iska, da aikace-aikacen ruwa.
features: Tsarin tuntuɓar SPDT don canzawa mai aminci
Aikin tafiya ta hannu don gwaji
Saitunan matsa lamba daban-daban masu daidaitawa
Ya dace da iskar gas da ruwa

schneider9013fsg2j24m4.title: Schneider Electric 9013FSG2J24M4 Sauya Pumptrol
schneider9013fsg2j24m4.description: Square D Pumptrol sauya matsa lamba tare da ƙarancin matsa lamba don aikace-aikacen famfo har zuwa 1.5 HP.
features: Ƙananan kariya mai ƙarancin matsa lamba

wikaPsm760.title: WIKA PSM-760 Sauya Matsi Mai Shiryawa
wikaPsm760.description: Saukakawa matsa lamba na lantarki mai shirye-shirye tare da fitarwa 4-20mA da nunin dijital don daidaitaccen sa ido kan matsa lamba da aikace-aikacen sarrafawa.
features: Sassan da aka jika na bakin karfe

abb266dsh.title: ABB 266DSH Bambancin Sauya Matsi
abb266dsh.description: Saukakawa matsa lamba daban-daban mai tabbatar da fashewa tare da NEMA 7 enclosure don aikace-aikacen yanki masu haɗari waɗanda ke buƙatar sa ido kan bambancin matsa lamba mai aminci.

ashcroftB424b.title: Ashcroft B424B Sauya Matsi Mai Nauyi
ashcroftB424b.description: Saukakawa matsa lamba na masana'antu mai nauyi tare da lambobin sadarwa na SPDT da ginin da ya dace don aiki mai aminci a cikin aikace-aikace masu buƙata.

endressFtl31.title: Endress+Hauser FTL31 Liquiphant Sauya Matakin
endressFtl31.description: Saukakawa matakin madaidaiciyar madaidaiciya don gano matakin ruwa tare da fasahar firikwensin aiki don hana cikawa da kariyar famfo.
features: Fasahar cokali mai yatsu tare da tuƙi na piezoelectric
Fasahar firikwensin aiki tana tabbatar da aikin na'ura
Ba a buƙatar gyara don kafofin watsa labarai daban-daban
An shigar da sama da miliyan 6 a duniya

abbLsSeries.title: ABB LS Series Sauya Matakin Inji
abbLsSeries.description: Madaidaicin sauya matakin iyo na inji tare da tsarin sauyawa da aka rufe don gano matakin madaidaicin ruwa mai aminci.
features: Tsarin da ya fi dacewa a kasuwar masana'antu
Tsarin sauyawa mai ɗaki biyu da aka rufe
Akwai a cikin flanged ko samfuran sakawa

vegaVegaswing61.title: VEGA VEGASWING 61 Sauya Matakin Rod Mai Girgizawa
vegaVegaswing61.description: Saukakawa matakin sandar girgizar duniya don gano matakin madaidaici a cikin ruwa da ƙarfi mai yawa tare da ƙirar ƙira da haɗin aikin G1.
features: Na duniya don ruwa da ƙarfi mai yawa
Ƙira da ba ta da kulawa

siemens7ml12Pointflex.title: Siemens 7ML12 Point flex Capacitance Sauya Matakin
siemens7ml12Pointflex.description: Sauya matakin madaidaiciyar capacitance tare da samar da wutar lantarki ta duniya da kariya ta IP66/67 don gano matakin ruwa mai aminci a cikin aikace-aikacen masana'antu.
features: Samar da wutar lantarki ta duniya 100-240VAC
Ya dace da kafofin watsa labarai masu gudanarwa/marasa gudanarwa

magnetrolEchotel961.title: Magnetrol Echotel 961/962 Sauya Matakin Ultrasonic
magnetrolEchotel961.description: Saukakawa matakin ultrasonic mara tuntuɓar tare da fitarwa 4-20mA don gano matakin ruwa ba tare da tuntuɓar jiki tare da kafofin watsa labarai ba.
features: Mafi dacewa don kafofin watsa labarai masu lalata/viscous

omronWlca12Y.title: Omron WLCA12-Y Sauya Iyaka Mai Nauyi
omronWlca12Y.description: Saukakawa iyaka mai nauyi mai ɗaukar nauyi tare da ƙimar IP67 da gidan karfe-cast don mawuyacin yanayin masana'antu.
features: Ƙimar kariya ta muhalli ta IP67
Ya dace da masana'antu masu nauyi na atomatik

schneiderXcmd21f0l1.title: Schneider Electric XCMD21F0L1 OsiSense Sauya Iyaka
schneiderXcmd21f0l1.description: Saukakawa iyaka mai daidaitaccen tsari daga kewayon OsiSense XC tare da mai ɗaukar nauyi mai sassauƙa don atomatik na masana'antu.
features: Bangare na OsiSense XC Standard range

schneiderXckpLimitSwitch.title: Schneider Electric XCKP Sauya Iyaka na Filastik
schneiderXckpLimitSwitch.description: Ƙaramin sauya iyaka na filastik tare da mai ɗaukar plunger, lambobin sadarwa 2NC+2NO, da kariya ta IP67 don aikace-aikacen atomatik na masana'antu.

abbLs30p.title: ABB LS30P Sauya Iyaka na Thermoplastic
abbLs30p.description: Sauya iyaka na gidan thermoplastic tare da tsarin aiki mai sauri da kariya ta IP66 don amintaccen gano matsayi a aikace-aikacen masana'antu.

eatonE51LimitSwitch.title: Eaton E51 Sauya Iyaka Mai Nauyi
eatonE51LimitSwitch.description: Sauya iyaka mai nauyi tare da gefen rotary actuator, saitin 4-pole, da kariya ta IP67 don mahalli masana'antu masu buƙata.

schneiderXb4ba21.title: Schneider Electric XB4BA21 Maɓallin Tura Harmony
schneiderXb4ba21.description: Maɓallin turawa na karfe 22mm tare da chromium-plated bezel daga jerin Harmony XB4 don bangarori masu sarrafa masana'antu.
features: Tsarin modular tare da abubuwan da za a iya musanyawa

eatonM22DrR.title: Eaton M22-DR-R Maɓallin Tura Tsayawa na Gaggawa
eatonM22DrR.description: Maɓallin turawa na tsayawa na gaggawa 22mm tare da jan kan naman kaza da tsarin murɗawa-don-saki don aikace-aikacen aminci.
features: Jan kan naman kaza don tsayawa na gaggawa
Ya dace da aikace-aikacen masana'antu masu sauƙi

schneiderXb5Harmony.title: Schneider Electric Harmony XB5 Maɓallin Tura LED
schneiderXb5Harmony.description: Maɓallin turawa mai haske 22mm tare da haɗaɗɗen LED, ginin karfe, da kariya ta IP65 don aikace-aikacen panel control.
features: Zaɓuɓɓukan launi da yawa suna akwai

abbCp110g.title: ABB CP1-10G Koren Maɓallin Tura
abbCp110g.description: Koren maɓallin turawa tare da lambobin sadarwa 1NO+1NC da kariya ta IP65 don aikace-aikacen sarrafa farawa/gudu a cikin bangarori na masana'antu.

siemens3su1Pushbutton.title: Siemens 3SU1 Maɓallin Tura Mai Haske
siemens3su1Pushbutton.description: Maɓallin turawa mai haske tare da bezel na karfe, aikin 24V, da kariya ta IP67 don sarrafa masana'antu da aikace-aikacen sigina.
features: Mai haske tare da bezel na karfe

fisherEdControlValve.title: Fisher easy-e™ ED Globe Control Valve
fisherEdControlValve.description: Ma'aunin toshe mai daidaitawa tare da jagorar keji da wurin zama na karfe-zuwa-karfe don amintaccen sarrafa tsari.
features: Shirye don matsayi na bawul na dijital

samson3241GlobeValve.title: SAMSON Nau'in 3241 Globe Control Valve
samson3241GlobeValve.description: Bawul ɗin pneumatic globe na masana'antu don aikin injiniya tare da zane na modular da trims masu musanyawa don halaye daban-daban na kwarara.
features: Trims masu musanyawa don halaye na kwarara
SAM DIGITAL shirye tare da bincike mai hasashe

fisher657SizeReducer.title: Fisher Nau'in 657 Rage Girman Bawul
fisher657SizeReducer.description: Maɓallin sarrafa rage girman mai aiki da diaphragm don ƙananan shigarwa waɗanda ke buƙatar kyakkyawan sarrafa kwarara a cikin ƙananan girman bututu.
features: Rage girman zane don ƙananan shigarwa

masoneilan41000Globe.title: Masoneilan 41000 Series Globe Control Valve
masoneilan41000Globe.description: Bawul ɗin pneumatic globe tare da daidaitaccen tsarin datsa don aikace-aikace masu tsauri waɗanda ke buƙatar daidaitaccen sarrafa kwarara da rufewa mai ƙarfi.
features: Zane na globe valve don daidaitaccen sarrafawa

samson3241PneumaticGlobeValve.title: SAMSON 3241 Pneumatic Globe Valve
samson3241PneumaticGlobeValve.description: Bawul ɗin pneumatic globe tare da jagorar zane mai tushe don amintaccen sarrafa tsari a cikin girman DN15-300 tare da kyakkyawan halaye na kwarara.
features: Zaɓuɓɓukan datsa da yawa suna akwai

asco8262h112dc24.title: ASCO 8262H112DC24 Janar Sabis Solenoid Valve
asco8262h112dc24.description: Bawul ɗin solenoid mai hanyoyi 2 da aka rufe a cikin ginin bakin karfe don aikace-aikacen iska, ruwa, mai mai sauƙi, da iskar gas.
features: Aiki mai hanyoyi 2 da aka rufe
Ya dace da nau'ikan watsa labarai da yawa

parkerS4aSolenoidValve.title: Parker S4A Series Refrigeration Solenoid Valve
parkerS4aSolenoidValve.description: Solenoid valve wanda aka ƙera don sanyaya da tsarin sarrafa ruwa, mai jituwa da refrigerants da yawa kuma an gina shi don faɗin matsa lamba.
features: Mai jituwa da R410A, R448A, R449A, R450A, R507A
An gina shi don tsarin sanyaya kasuwanci

asco8210g094.title: ASCO 8210G094 2-Hanya NC Solenoid Valve
asco8210g094.description: Bawul ɗin solenoid na tagulla mai hanyoyi 2 da aka rufe tare da haɗin 1/2 NPT da coil 120VAC don aikace-aikacen sabis na gabaɗaya.
features: Aiki mai hanyoyi 2 da aka rufe

burkert6013.title: Bürkert Nau'in 6013 Kai tsaye-Aiki Solenoid Valve
burkert6013.description: Kai tsaye-aiki 2/2-hanya solenoid valve tare da FKM seal da 24VDC coil don daidaitaccen sarrafa ruwa a cikin aikace-aikacen tsari.

parker71215sn2vn00.title: Parker 71215SN2VN00 Yawanci Buɗe Solenoid Valve
parker71215sn2vn00.description: Yawanci buɗe bawul ɗin solenoid bakin karfe tare da haɗin 1/4 inch da coil 12VDC don ƙwarewar aikace-aikacen sarrafawa.

fisherV150VeeBallValve.title: Fisher V150 Vee-Ball Bawul Mai Kunna/Kashe
fisherV150VeeBallValve.description: Fisher V150 Vee-Ball bawul tare da V-notch ball don amintaccen sabis na kunnawa-kashe ko throttling. Yana fasalta splined shaft shaft don rotary actuators, ginin flanged mai fuska, da kayan aiki masu dacewa da NACE MR0175-2 don sabis mai tsami.
features: NACE MR0175-2 sabis mai tsami mai dacewa

fisherV280BallValve.title: Fisher V280 Cikakken-Bore Ball Control Valve
fisherV280BallValve.description: Babban aikin Fisher V280 guda uku trunnion ɗin da aka ɗora cikakken-bore ball valve don sabis na kunnawa-kashe. Yana sarrafa cikakken digo na matsa lamba na CL900 tare da attenuator mai hakowa na zaɓi don sarrafa amo/girgiza. Zane mai aminci da kayan aiki masu dacewa da NACE.
features: Cikakken-bore trunnion ɗin da aka ɗora
Mai iya digo na matsa lamba na CL900
Zaɓin attenuator na amo don ruwa/gas
Ginin da aka tabbatar da aminci

flowserveWorcesterF519BallValve.title: Flowserve Worcester F519 ASA150 Ball Valve
flowserveWorcesterF519BallValve.description: Worcester F519 ASA150 flanged ball valve tare da zane mai iyo. Ƙungiya ta uku ta amince da BS 5351 tare da gwajin wuta zuwa BS EN 10497. Yana fasalta ISO 5211 actuator mounting, anti-blowout stem, da anti-static design.

flowserveWorcesterSeries44BallValve.title: Flowserve Worcester Series 44 Bawul Mai Guda Uku
flowserveWorcesterSeries44BallValve.description: Babban bawul ɗin Worcester Series 44 mai guda uku wanda aka ƙera zuwa ƙayyadaddun ANSI B16.34. Yana fasalta fasahar wurin zama mai ci gaba don rufewa mai ƙarfi, ana iya saita shi don aikace-aikacen sarrafa kunnawa-kashe ko throttling.
features: Zane na bawul mai guda uku

swagelokSs43gs4BallValve.title: Swagelok SS-43GS4 40G Series Ball Valve
swagelokSs43gs4BallValve.description: Swagelok SS-43GS4 bakin karfe guda ɗaya kayan aiki ball valve don sabis na kwata-kwata. Yana fasalta ƙimar 3,000 PSI, ƙarfin hawan keke mai zafi, -65°F zuwa 300°F range, da gyare-gyaren tattarawa.

burkert2655BallValve.title: Burkert Nau'in 2655 Pneumatic Ball Valve
burkert2655BallValve.description: Burkert Nau'in 2655 mai guda uku tare da Nau'in 2050 pneumatic rotary actuator don aikin kunnawa-kashe. Yana fasalta ISO 5211 standard interface, linear piston tare da haɗin kai mai sauri, da aikin 2/2-hanya don rufewa da rarraba kwarara.

atomberg-efficio-1200-bldc.title: Atomberg Efficio 1200mm Fanka Rufi na BLDC
atomberg-efficio-1200-bldc.description: Babban fanka mai amfani da wutar lantarki ta BLDC daga Atomberg tare da amfani da wutar lantarki 27W kawai da iska mai shiga 236 CMM. Yana fasalta babban ƙimar sabis na 8.7, RF remote control, da tanadin makamashi 65% idan aka kwatanta da fanka na gargajiya.
features: Mafi girman ƙimar sabis na 8.7 CMM/W
Amfani da wutar lantarki mai ƙarancin gaske 27W
RF remote tare da yanayin ƙarfafawa & bacci
Tanadin makamashi 65% idan aka kwatanta da fanka na gargajiya

havells-efficiencia-neo-1200.title: Havells Efficiencia Neo 1200mm Fanka Rufi na BLDC
havells-efficiencia-neo-1200.description: Fanka mai cin nasara ta BLDC daga Havells tare da amfani da wutar lantarki 26W da iska mai shiga 220 CMM. Wanda ya lashe lambar yabo ta National Energy Conservation Award 2021, wanda ke fasalta 100% jan ƙarfe mai jujjuyawa da yanayin sarrafawa mai ci gaba.
features: Wanda ya lashe lambar yabo ta National Energy Conservation Award 2021
Amfani da wutar lantarki mai inganci 26W
RF remote tare da yanayi 4 (Ƙarfafawa, Bacci, Iska, Mop)
100% jan ƙarfe mai jujjuyawa don dorewa
Garantin shekaru 2+1 (ana iya tsawaita shi zuwa shekaru 5)

superfan-superx1-1200-bldc.title: Superfan SuperX1 1200mm Fanka Rufi na BLDC
superfan-superx1-1200-bldc.description: Fanka ta farko ta BLDC a Indiya daga Superfan tare da amfani da wutar lantarki 35W da ultra-wide voltage range na 90-300V. Yana fasalta garanti na shekaru 5, remote mai aminci, da yanayin iska na halitta don mafi kyawun jin daɗi.
features: Fanka ta farko ta BLDC a Indiya (an ƙaddamar da ita a 2012)
Aikin lokaci tare da saituna da yawa
Tanadin makamashi 56% idan aka kwatanta da fanka na gargajiya

bldc-deluxe1600.title: Deluxe BLDC Fanka Rufi 1600mm
bldc-deluxe1600.description: Babban fanka mai nauyin 80W brushless DC tare da diamita mai faɗin 1600mm. Siffofin ƙima ciki har da smart controls, advanced aerodynamics, da kuma keɓantaccen ingancin gini don aikace-aikacen alatu.

bldc-industrial1800.title: Industrial BLDC Fanka Rufi 1800mm
bldc-industrial1800.description: Fanka mai girma mai nauyin 100W brushless DC wanda aka tsara don manyan wuraren masana'antu. Matsakaicin iska mai shiga tare da ginin nauyi mai nauyi don aiki 24/7 a cikin mahalli masana'antu masu buƙata.
features: Ginin nauyi mai nauyi don aiki 24/7
Babban iska mai shiga don manyan wurare
Kayan aiki da ƙarewa na masana'antu
An tsara shi don mahalli masu buƙata
Tsawaita garanti na masana'antu na shekaru 5

bldc-economy900.title: Tattalin Arziki BLDC Fanka Rufi 900mm
bldc-economy900.description: Fanka mai araha mai nauyin 35W brushless DC tare da diamita mai faɗin 900mm. Tsarin amfani da wutar lantarki mai inganci cikakke ne don ƙananan matsakaitan dakuna tare da ainihin remote control da aiki mai aminci.
features: Tsarin motar 35W mai amfani da wutar lantarki

bldc-exhaust-fan-motor.title: BLDC Exhaust Fan Motor 25W
bldc-exhaust-fan-motor.description: Babban motar 25W brushless DC don aikace-aikacen exhaust fan. Yana fasalta ginin ball bearing, kariya ta IP44, da aiki mai shiru don tsarin samun iska na zama da kasuwanci.

bldc-cooler-motors.title: BLDC Cooler Motor 45W
bldc-cooler-motors.description: Motar 45W brushless DC mai ƙarfi don aikace-aikacen sanyaya iska. Tsarin ci gaba tare da inganci 90%, sarrafa gudun bambance-bambance, da haɓaka ƙimar kariya don aikin sanyaya mai aminci.

bldc-ventilation-system.title: BLDC Tsarin Samun Iska 75W
bldc-ventilation-system.description: Motar 75W brushless DC na masana'antu don tsarin samun iska. Babban inganci a 92%, babban iska mai shiga, da ginin ƙarfi don aikace-aikacen HVAC masu buƙata.

bldc-ventilation-motors.title: BLDC Motocin Samun Iska 35W
bldc-ventilation-motors.description: Motar 35W brushless DC mai inganci don aikace-aikacen samun iska. Daidaitaccen aiki tare da 280 CFM iska mai shiga, ya dace da tsarin samun iska na zama da kasuwanci mai sauƙi.
features: Mai kyau iska mai shiga 280 CFM

bldc-industrial-exhaust.title: Industrial BLDC Exhaust Fan 120W
bldc-industrial-exhaust.description: Babban motar 120W brushless DC don aikace-aikacen exhaust na masana'antu. Gine-gine mai nauyi tare da keɓantaccen iska mai shiga da aminci don mahalli masana'antu masu buƙata.
features: Kariyar IP67 don mahalli masu tsauri
Tsawaita garanti na masana'antu na shekaru 3

bldc-mini-cooler.title: Ƙaramin BLDC Cooler Motor 15W
bldc-mini-cooler.description: Ƙaramin motar 15W brushless DC wanda aka tsara don aikace-aikacen sanyaya ƙanana. Tsarin amfani da wutar lantarki mai inganci tare da aiki mai shiru da aiki mai aminci don na'urorin sanyaya na sirri.
features: Aikin amfani da wutar lantarki mai inganci
Ya dace da na'urorin sanyaya na sirri

dc-surface-pump-2hp.title: DC Surface Pump 2HP
dc-surface-pump-2hp.description: Babban famfo mai nauyin 2HP DC tare da ikon fara aiki da kansa. Babban ƙimar kwarara na 3600 LPH tare da 150ft head capacity, cikakke don aikin gona da aikace-aikacen canja wurin ruwa na masana'antu.

hybrid-bldc-pump.title: Tsarin Famfo na Hybrid BLDC
hybrid-bldc-pump.description: Tsarin famfo na hybrid BLDC mai ci gaba wanda ke haɗa ikon aiki na DC da AC. Yana fasalta ƙarfin 1.5HP tare da 2700 LPH kwarara da 120ft head capacity, cikakke don aikace-aikacen famfo na ruwa masu yawa.
features: Aikin amfani da wutar lantarki mai inganci
Dacewa da tushen wutar lantarki mai yawa

bldc-table-fan-motors.title: BLDC Motocin Fanka na Tebur
bldc-table-fan-motors.description: Babban motocin fanka na tebur na BLDC mai inganci tare da amfani da wutar lantarki 28W da saurin 2100 RPM. Yana fasalta aikin remote control da diamita 400mm don mafi kyawun yaɗuwar iska a wuraren zama da kasuwanci.
features: Aikin amfani da wutar lantarki mai inganci 28W

bldc-wall-fan-motors.title: BLDC Motocin Fanka na Bango
bldc-wall-fan-motors.description: Motocin fanka na bango na BLDC mai ƙarfi tare da ƙarfin 35W da saurin 1800 RPM. Yana fasalta diamita 450mm da ikon oscillation don yaɗuwar iska mai tasiri a bango a cikin mahalli daban-daban na cikin gida.
features: 35W amfani da wutar lantarki mai inganci
Aikin oscillation don rarraba iska mafi kyau

bldc-pedestal-fan-motors.title: BLDC Motocin Fanka na Tushe
bldc-pedestal-fan-motors.description: Babban motocin fanka na tushe na BLDC masu daidaitacce da oscillation. Iska mai ƙarfi tare da aikin amfani da wutar lantarki mai inganci don wuraren zama da kasuwanci.
features: Motar BLDC mai amfani da wutar lantarki

power-distribution-cables.title: Kebul na Rarraba Wuta
power-distribution-cables.description: Kebul na rarraba wuta mai nauyi tare da XLPE insulation don amintaccen watsawa wutar lantarki. Akwai a cikin jeri na wutar lantarki daga 1kV zuwa 33kV tare da jan ƙarfe ko masu gudanar da aluminium don aikace-aikacen masana'antu daban-daban.
features: Zaɓuɓɓukan jan ƙarfe da masu gudanar da aluminium
Ya dace da shigarwa a ƙarƙashin ƙasa da sama

communication-cables.title: Kebul na Sadarwa
communication-cables.description: Kebul na sadarwa na Category 6A mai aiki tare da bandwidth 500 MHz don aikace-aikacen sadarwar zamani. Kariyar F/UTP tana tabbatar da amintaccen watsawa bayanai a cikin mahalli masu buƙata.

mcb-circuit-breakers.title: MCB Ƙananan Masu Kariya ta Zagaye
mcb-circuit-breakers.description: MCB Ƙananan masu kariya ta zagaye don kariya daga wuce gona da iri da gajerun hanyoyi. Akwai a cikin jeri na yanzu daga 6A zuwa 63A tare da daidaitattun sanduna da yawa don cikakken kariya ta lantarki.
features: Amincewa kariya daga wuce gona da iri

mccb-circuit-breakers.title: MCCB Masu Kariya ta Zagaye
mccb-circuit-breakers.description: MCCB Masu kariya ta zagaye don aikace-aikacen babban yanzu. Akwai daga 16A zuwa 1600A tare da 50kA ikon karya don amintaccen kariya a cikin tsarin lantarki na masana'antu.

industrial-fuses.title: Fuses na HRC na Masana'antu
industrial-fuses.description: Fuses na masana'antu masu girma (HRC) don kariya daga yanzu. Akwai daga 2A zuwa 800A tare da jeri na wutar lantarki har zuwa 11kV da 80kA ikon karya don mahimman kariya na masana'antu.
features: Nau'in HRC don babban ikon karya
Saurin kariya daga wuce gona da iri

terminal-blocks.title: Terminal Blocks na Masana'antu
terminal-blocks.description: Terminal blocks masu yawa don amintattun haɗin lantarki a cikin bangarori masu sarrafa masana'antu. Akwai a cikin nau'ikan dunƙule da bazara tare da ƙimar yanzu daga 10A zuwa 150A da DIN rail mounting.

industrial-connectors.title: Masu Haɗin Aiki Mai Nauyi na Masana'antu
industrial-connectors.description: Masu haɗin aiki mai nauyi na masana'antu waɗanda aka tsara don mahalli masu tsauri. Akwai tare da fil 3-128, ƙimar yanzu har zuwa 400A, da kariya ta IP67 don amintattun haɗin gwiwa a cikin aikace-aikace masu buƙata.
features: Ginin nauyi mai nauyi don amfanin masana'antu
Ya dace da mahalli masu tsauri

signal-connectors.title: Masu Haɗin Sigina
signal-connectors.description: Ƙananan masu haɗin sigina don daidaitaccen watsawa bayanai a cikin sarrafawa da aikace-aikacen kayan aiki. Yana fasalta daidaitattun fil 2-50 tare da 360° EMI kariya don amincin sigina.

omron-e2e-x5me1-pnp-proximity.title: Omron E2E-X5ME1 PNP Mai Auna Nisa
omron-e2e-x5me1-pnp-proximity.description: Babban aiki Omron PNP mai auna nisa tare da nisan auna 5mm. Yana fasalta PNP NO/NC fitarwa, kariya ta IP67, da M12 connector don amintattun aikace-aikacen sarrafa masana'antu.

pepperl-fuchs-nbb5-18gm60-e2-pnp.title: Pepperl+Fuchs NBB5-18GM60-E2 PNP Mai Auna Nisa
pepperl-fuchs-nbb5-18gm60-e2-pnp.description: Pepperl+Fuchs PNP mai auna nisa na masana'antu tare da nisan auna 5mm. Yana fasalta kariya ta IP68, takardar shaidar ATEX, da 5000Hz sauya mitar don aikace-aikacen mahalli masu tsauri.
features: Kariyar IP68 don mahalli masu tsauri

belden8205.title: Kebul na Kayan Aiki na Belden 8205
belden8205.description: Kebul na kayan aiki na Belden 8205 mai murɗaɗɗen waya tare da masu gudanar da jan ƙarfe 20 AWG. Rufin PVC da jaket don watsa sigina mai aminci a cikin aikace-aikacen sarrafa masana'antu.
features: Masu gudanar da jan ƙarfe 20 AWG

belden8442.title: Kebul na Kayan Aiki Mai Kariya na Belden 8442
belden8442.description: Kebul na Belden 8442 mai kariya mai murɗaɗɗen waya mai haɓaka wutar lantarki tare da masu gudanarwa 22 AWG. Yana fasalta foil da kariya (90% coverage) don kariya ta EMI mafi girma a cikin kayan aikin masana'antu.
features: Jan ƙarfe mai haɓaka wutar lantarki 22 AWG
Mafi kyau don mahalli masu hayaniya

belden8725.title: Kebul na Kayan Aiki Mai Yawa na Belden 8725
belden8725.description: Kebul na kayan aiki mai yawa na Belden 8725 tare da nau'i-nau'i 4 na #20 AWG masu gudanarwa. CM rated tare da garkuwar foil gabaɗaya don watsa sigina mai aminci a cikin shigarwar kasuwanci.
features: #20 AWG jan ƙarfe mai murɗaɗɗen gwangwani

alphaWire9174.title: Kebul na Kayan Aiki na Alpha Wire 9174
alphaWire9174.description: Kebul na Alpha Wire 9174 mai murɗaɗɗen waya tare da masu gudanar da jan ƙarfe 20 AWG. Yana fasalta rufin polyethylene, kariya ta aluminum-mylar foil, da ƙimar 1100V don aikace-aikace masu buƙata.
features: Masu gudanar da jan ƙarfe 20 AWG
1 murɗaɗɗen waya tare da waya mai magudanar ruwa
Aluminum-Mylar foil + kariya ta waya mai magudanar ruwa

alphaWireXtraGuard4.title: Kebul na Masana'antu na Alpha Wire Xtra-Guard 4
alphaWireXtraGuard4.description: Kebul na Alpha Wire Xtra-Guard 4 mai dorewa na masana'antu tare da rufin polyethylene mai haɗin giciye. UL VW-1 da CSA FT-1 rated don mahalli masana'antu masu buƙata.
features: 18-12 AWG jan ƙarfe mai murɗaɗɗen gwangwani

phoenixContactM12Oneclick.title: Mai Haɗin ONECLICK M12 na Phoenix Contact
phoenixContactM12Oneclick.description: Mai haɗin M12 ONECLICK mai turawa-ja na Phoenix Contact tare da kariyar IP67. Yana fasalta tsarin sanduna 4-8 da zaɓuɓɓukan coding da yawa don haɗin na'ura mai auna firikwensin masana'antu da na'ura mai motsi.

phoenixContactM23.title: Mai Haɗin Gicciye na Phoenix Contact M23
phoenixContactM23.description: Mai haɗin gicciye na Phoenix Contact M23 don sigina, bayanai, da watsawar wutar lantarki. Yana fasalta har zuwa sanduna 17, jituwa mai siyar da igiyar ruwa, da kariyar IP67 lokacin da aka haɗa.
features: Kariyar IP67 lokacin da aka haɗa
Jituwa mai siyar da igiyar ruwa

weidmullerRockstarModuplug.title: Mai Haɗin Ɗaukar Nauyi na Weidmüller RockStar ModuPlug
weidmullerRockstarModuplug.description: Mai haɗin masana'antu mai nauyi na Weidmüller RockStar ModuPlug. Yana fasalta tsarin saka mai fa'ida, har zuwa ƙarfin 35A/830V, da kariyar IP65/IP66/IP67 don injinan masana'antu.

amphenolM12Industrial.title: Mai Haɗin M12 na Amphenol na Masana'antu
amphenolM12Industrial.description: Mai haɗin M12 na Amphenol na masana'antu don na'ura mai auna firikwensin da aikace-aikacen na'ura mai motsi. Yana fasalta zaɓuɓɓukan sanduna 3-12, kariyar IP67/IP68, da nau'ikan coding da yawa don sarrafa kansa na masana'antu.
features: Tsarin M12 mai zagaye na masana'antu
Aikace-aikacen na'ura mai auna firikwensin/na'ura mai motsi

amphenolMilDtl5015.title: Mai Haɗin Soja na Amphenol MIL-DTL-5015
amphenolMilDtl5015.description: Mai haɗin sojan Amphenol MIL-DTL-5015 mai ƙayyadaddun ƙayyadaddun ƙira tare da ƙirar ƙarfi. Yana fasalta matsayi 2-128, harsashin gami na aluminum, da matsanancin ƙimar zafin jiki don mahalli masu tsauri.

mennekesPowertopXtra16a.title: Filogi na Masana'antu na Mennekes PowerTOP Xtra 16A
mennekesPowertopXtra16a.description: Filogi na Mennekes PowerTOP Xtra 16A tare da tsarin 3P+N+PE. IEC 60309 compliant tare da kariyar IP54/IP67 don amintattun haɗin wutar lantarki a cikin mahalli na masana'antu.

mennekesPowertopXtra32a.title: Filogi na Masana'antu na Mennekes PowerTOP Xtra 32A
mennekesPowertopXtra32a.description: Filogi na Mennekes PowerTOP Xtra 32A tare da fasahar X-CONTACT. Yana fasalta ƙarfin 32A, kariyar IP67, da ginin juriya ga tasiri don aikace-aikacen masana'antu masu buƙata.

mennekes552.title: Filogi na Mennekes 552 Mai Hana Ruwa na Masana'antu
mennekes552.description: Filogi na Mennekes 552 mai hana ruwa don aikace-aikacen waje. Yana fasalta ƙarfin 16A, kariyar IP67, da ginin thermoplastic don amintattun haɗin wutar lantarki na waje.
features: Zane da aka ƙima a waje

hubbellHbl2621.title: Filogi mai murɗawa na Hubbell Hubbellock HBL2621
hubbellHbl2621.description: Filogi mai murɗawa na Hubbell Hubbellock HBL2621 tare da ƙarfin 30A. Yana fasalta tsarin L15-30P, ginin nailan, da amintaccen tsarin murɗawa don amintattun haɗin wutar lantarki na masana'antu.

legrandCee16a.title: Filogi na Masana'antu na Legrand CEE 16A
legrandCee16a.description: Filogi na Legrand CEE 16A mai yarda da IEC 60309. Yana fasalta tsarin 3P+N+PE, kariyar IP44, da ginin polyamide don amintaccen rarraba wutar lantarki na masana'antu.

bussmannLpCc30.title: Fuse Block na Bussmann LP-CC-30 Class CC
bussmannLpCc30.description: Fuse block na Bussmann (Eaton) LP-CC-30 Class CC tare da ƙimar 30A. Yana fasalta hawa 3-sanduna DIN-rail, ginin modular, da ƙarfin 600V don aikace-aikacen panel na masana'antu.

bussmannFnqR60.title: Fuse na Bussmann FNQ-R-60 Class CC Rejection
bussmannFnqR60.description: Fuse na Bussmann FNQ-R-60 Class CC tare da jinkirin lokaci da ƙimar 60A. Yana fasalta ƙarfin katsewa 200kA da tsarin ƙin yarda don aikace-aikacen sarrafa masana'antu.

littelfuseL60030c.title: Littelfuse L60030C Fuse Block na Class CC
littelfuseL60030c.description: Littelfuse L60030C Class CC fuse block mai ƙimar 30A. Yana fasalta hawa 3-pole DIN-rail, ginin modular, da ƙarfin 600V don aikace-aikacen panel na masana'antu.

littelfuseAto30.title: Littelfuse ATO-30 Fuse ɗin Abin Hawa
littelfuseAto30.description: Littelfuse ATO-30 fuse ɗin abin hawa/masana'antu mai ƙimar 30A. Ƙirar ruwa ta ATO/ATC na yau da kullun don ƙananan ƙarfin lantarki na abin hawa da aikace-aikacen masana'antu.
features: Girman ATO/ATC na yau da kullun

mersenA70p1004.title: Mersen A70P100-4 Fuse Mai Sauri na Class J
mersenA70p1004.description: Mersen A70P100-4 Class J fuse mai saurin aiki mai ƙimar 100A. Yana fasalta ƙarfin katsewa 200kA, ƙarfin iyaka 40kA a 600V, da bin UL 248-8.
features: Class J fuse mai saurin aiki

tdkLambdaI1c120w.title: TDK-Lambda i1C-120W Mai Sauya DC-DC Mara Keɓewa
tdkLambdaI1c120w.description: TDK-Lambda i1C-120W mai sauya DC-DC mara keɓewa mai ingancin 98%. Yana fasalta jeri na shigar da 9-36V, ƙarfin fitarwa 120W, da cikakken kariya don aikace-aikacen masana'antu.

tdkLambdaCnB110.title: TDK-Lambda CN-B110 Keɓaɓɓen Mai Sauyawa na Kwata-Bulok
tdkLambdaCnB110.description: TDK-Lambda CN-B110 keɓaɓɓen mai sauyawa DC-DC na kwata-bulok. Yana fasalta shigar 43-160V, fitarwa 50-300W, keɓewa 1500V, da har zuwa inganci 92%.

vicorDcm2322.title: Vicor DCM 2322 Keɓaɓɓen Mai Sauyawa ZVS Buck-Boost
vicorDcm2322.description: Vicor DCM 2322 keɓaɓɓen mai sauyawa marar ƙarfi ZVS buck-boost. Yana fasalta shigar 9-50V, fitarwa 9-420V, ƙarfin 120W, da inganci 96% tare da keɓewa 2250V.

vicorDcm3623.title: Vicor DCM 3623 Keɓaɓɓen Mai Sauyawa VIA
vicorDcm3623.description: Vicor DCM 3623 keɓaɓɓen mai sauyawa VIA (Vicor Integrated Adapter) mai fitarwa 320W. Yana fasalta shigar 200-425V, inganci 96%, da keɓewa 2250V a cikin kunshin DCM ChiP.

murataDcs612.title: Murata DCS6-12 Keɓaɓɓen Mai Sauyawa DC-DC
murataDcs612.description: Murata DCS6-12 keɓaɓɓen mai sauyawa DC-DC mai fitarwa 6W. Yana fasalta shigar 9-18V, fitarwa 12V, keɓewa 1500V, da kunshin SIP don aikace-aikacen da sarari ya takura.

eaton9px1500rt.title: Tsarin Eaton 9PX1500RT UPS
eaton9px1500rt.description: Eaton 9PX1500RT UPS mai juyawa biyu ta kan layi mai ƙarfin 1500VA/1350W. Yana fasalta ƙirar rack/hasumiya mai iya canzawa, zaɓin baturi na lithium-ion, da katin sadarwa a shirye don mahimmin kariya ta wutar lantarki.
features: Kanfigare na kan layi mai juyawa biyu
3-11 min lokacin gudu a cikakken kaya

eaton9px3000rt.title: Tsarin Eaton 9PX3000RT UPS na Kan layi
eaton9px3000rt.description: Eaton 9PX3000RT online double-conversion UPS mai ƙarfin 3000VA/3000W. Yana fasalta fasahar ABM, Energy Star ta tabbatar har zuwa inganci 93%, da ƙirar rack/hasumiya 2U.
features: Batir masu iya musanyawa da zafi

apcSmt1500rm2u.title: APC Smart-UPS SMT1500RM2U Rack-Mount UPS
apcSmt1500rm2u.description: APC Smart-UPS SMT1500RM2U line-interactive UPS mai ƙarfin 1500VA/1000W. Yana fasalta ƙirar rack-mount 2U, nunin LCD, da SmartSlot don katin gudanarwa na cibiyar sadarwa.
features: 4.3 min lokacin gudu a cikakken kaya
Tsarin daidaita wutar lantarki ta atomatik

apcSrt8kxlt.title: APC Smart-UPS SRT8KXLT UPS na Kan layi
apcSrt8kxlt.description: APC Smart-UPS SRT8KXLT online double-conversion UPS mai ƙarfin 8000VA/8000W. Yana fasalta tashar EPO, gudanarwa na cibiyar sadarwa, ƙirar rack/hasumiya, da har zuwa inganci 95%.
features: 5.5 min lokacin gudu a cikakken kaya
EPO tsarin kashe wuta ta gaggawa
Gudanarwa na cibiyar sadarwa a haɗe

schneiderGalaxyVs.title: Schneider Electric Galaxy VS UPS na Modular
schneiderGalaxyVs.description: Schneider Electric Galaxy VS modular 3-phase online UPS mai ƙarfin 10-100kVA. Yana fasalta ingancin yanayin ECO 99%, N+1 redundancy, HMI na fuskar tabawa, da kuma ma'aunin wutar lantarki mai iya faɗaɗawa.
features: Ma'auni masu iya musanyawa da zafi

rittalJb121406.title: Akwatin Haɗin Karfe na Rittal JB121406
rittalJb121406.description: Rittal JB121406 akwati ne mai ƙarfi na haɗin karfe mai kariya ta IP66, yana fasalta ƙofa mai hinge don sauƙin shiga. Girma 12×14×6 inci tare da ƙimar NEMA 4 don yanayin masana'antu.
features: Ƙofa mai hinge don sauƙin shiga

hoffmanA6044ch.title: Akwatin Haɗin Karfe na Hoffman A6044CH
hoffmanA6044ch.description: Hoffman A6044CH akwati ne mai ƙarami na haɗin karfe mai ƙirar hinge mai ci gaba. Yana fasalta kariya ta NEMA 12 da IP65, wanda ya dace don aikace-aikacen masana'antu na cikin gida.

hoffmanA1086chscfg.title: Akwatin Haɗin Fiberglass na Hoffman A1086CHSCFG
hoffmanA1086chscfg.description: Hoffman A1086CHSCFG akwati ne na haɗin fiberglass tare da latch na kwata-kwata. Yana fasalta kariya ta NEMA 13 da IP66 don mawuyacin yanayi.

fiboxArca806030.title: Akwatin Haɗin Polycarbonate na Fibox ARCA 806030
fiboxArca806030.description: Fibox ARCA 806030 akwati ne na haɗin polycarbonate mai jure UV. Yana ba da kariya ta IP66/IP67 biyu don waje da mawuyacin yanayi.
features: Zaɓin murfin da ke nuna haske

fiboxTempoTam302515.title: Akwatin Haɗin ABS na Fibox TEMPO TAM302515
fiboxTempoTam302515.description: Fibox TEMPO TAM302515 akwati ne na haɗin ABS mai murfin da ke nuna haske don gani. Yana fasalta kariya ta IP65 da girma na metric.

phoenixBc356.title: Gidan DIN Rail na Modular na Phoenix Contact BC 35.6
phoenixBc356.description: Phoenix Contact BC 35.6 gida ne na DIN rail na modular mai faɗin 35.6mm. An yi shi daga polyamide tare da kariya ta IP20 don daidaitattun aikace-aikacen masana'antu.

phoenixMcsIp67.title: Gidan DIN Rail na Phoenix Contact MCS-IP67
phoenixMcsIp67.description: Phoenix Contact MCS-IP67 gida ne na DIN rail mai kariya mai ƙarfi. Yana fasalta faɗin 53.6mm, ƙimar IP67 tare da hatimi, da tashoshi masu turawa.
features: IP67 mai ƙima tare da hatimi

abbMistral36.title: ABB Mistral36 Gidan DIN Rail
abbMistral36.description: ABB Mistral36 gida ne na DIN rail mai nau'i 36 tare da kofa mai haske. Zane mai hawa bango don sauƙin shigarwa da isa.

abbMistral54.title: ABB Mistral54 Gidan Mita
abbMistral54.description: ABB Mistral54 gida ne na mita mai nau'i 54 tare da kofa mai juyawa da tsarin rufewa. An ƙera shi don aikace-aikacen auna mita.

phoenixIcs77.title: Phoenix Contact ICS-77 Gidan Haɗin Kai na Modular
phoenixIcs77.description: Phoenix Contact ICS-77 ƙaramin gidan DIN rail tare da zaɓuɓɓukan haɗin kai na zamani. Yana goyan bayan haɗin RJ45/USB a cikin girma 77×25×12mm.

watlowFirerod14500.title: Watlow FIREROD-1/4-500 Hita Katako
watlowFirerod14500.description: Watlow FIREROD-1/4-500 hita ne na katako mai diamita 1/4 inci da aka ƙima a 500W, 240V. Gine-gine mai ƙarfi don iyakar canja wurin zafi.

chromaloxTlo20.title: Chromalox TLO-20 Hita Nutsewa mai Siffar Bututu
chromaloxTlo20.description: Chromalox TLO-20 hita ne mai nutsewa mai siffar bututu mai karfin 20kW tare da ginin karfen carbon. An ƙera shi don aikace-aikacen dumama masana'antu na 480V.
features: Zane mai nutsewa mai siffar bututu

watlowWatrod43010.title: Watlow WATROD-430-10 Hita Mai Siffar Bututu
watlowWatrod43010.description: Watlow WATROD-430-10 hita ne mai siffar bututu mai diamita 0.430 inci don dumama bututu. Fitar wutar lantarki 10kW don dumama iska na masana'antu.

chromaloxSre10.title: Chromalox SRE-10 Na'urar Dumama Lantarki
chromaloxSre10.description: Chromalox SRE-10 na'urar dumama lantarki mai karfin 10kW a 240V. Gine-ginen waya mai juriya don dumama mai aminci.

omegaCsh102.title: Omega CSH-102 Hita Coil Mai Ruɓi
omegaCsh102.description: Omega CSH-102 hita coil ne mai karfin 1000W tare da ginin nau'in ruɓi. Ayyukan 120V don aikace-aikacen dumama masu sauƙi.

watlowFirebarFb15.title: Watlow FIREBAR-FB15 Hita Mai Siffar Bututu Mai Ƙare Guda
watlowFirebarFb15.description: Watlow FIREBAR-FB15 hita ne mai siffar bututu mai ƙare guda da aka ƙima a 1500W, 240V. Hawa mai flange don tabbatar da shigarwa.
features: Zane mai siffar bututu mai ƙare guda

chromaloxCes028.title: Chromalox CES-028 Na'urar Katako
chromaloxCes028.description: Chromalox CES-028 na'urar dumama katako mai karfin 2800W. Gine-ginen bakin karfe don aikace-aikacen 480V.

watlowUltramicAln250.title: Watlow ULTRAMIC-AlN-250 Hitar Ceramic
watlowUltramicAln250.description: Watlow ULTRAMIC-AlN-250 hita ne na ceramic tare da aluminum nitride substrate. 250W mai tsabta mai samar da zafi don aikace-aikace masu daidaito.

omegaCss01250.title: Omega CSS-01250 Hita Mai ɗaukar Ruɓi na Mica
omegaCss01250.description: Omega CSS-01250 hita ne mai ɗaukar ruɓi tare da keɓewar mica. Ƙarfin 1250W a 240V don aikace-aikacen dumama sama.
features: Zane na hita mai ɗaukar ruɓi

chromaloxTmo10.title: Chromalox TMO-10 Hita Mai Siffar Bututu Mai Rufe Karfe
chromaloxTmo10.description: Chromalox TMO-10 hita ne mai siffar bututu mai rufe karfe tare da INCOLOY sheath. Ƙarfin 10kW a 600V don aikace-aikace masu babban zafin jiki.
features: Zane mai siffar bututu mai rufe karfe

watlowCirculationCh50.title: Watlow Circulation Heater CH-50
watlowCirculationCh50.description: Watlow Circulation Heater CH-50 mai karfin 50kW don dumama tsari. Zane mai flange don aikace-aikacen masana'antu na 480V.

chromaloxCvep15.title: Chromalox CVEP-15 Hita Mai Haɗari
chromaloxCvep15.description: Chromalox CVEP-15 hita mai tabbatar da fashewa da aka ƙima a 15kW. Class I Division 1 ta tabbatar da wurare masu haɗari.

watlowDuctDh30.title: Watlow Duct Heater DH-30
watlowDuctDh30.description: Watlow Duct Heater DH-30 mai karfin 30kW don dumama iska. 480V 3-phase ginin zamani don aikace-aikacen HVAC.

chromaloxImmersionPmh25.title: Chromalox Immersion PMH-25
chromaloxImmersionPmh25.description: Chromalox Immersion PMH-25 hita mai nutsewa mai karfin 25kW. ANSI flange hawa tare da ginin bakin karfe don aikace-aikacen 600V.

omegaFma1020.title: Omega FMA-1020 Hita Iska Mai Fuka-fukai
omegaFma1020.description: Omega FMA-1020 hita iska mai fuka-fukai mai karfin 10kW. Ayyukan 240V tare da tilasta zagayawar iska don ingantaccen dumama.

orientalMd6p38.title: Oriental Motor MD-6P38 Motar Shayarwa ta BLDC
orientalMd6p38.description: Oriental Motor MD-6P38 DC axial fan motar da aka ƙima a 38W, 24VDC. Zane na sanduna 6 na BLDC tare da kariyar IP55 don aikace-aikacen fitar da masana'antu.

nidecD12e24ts3.title: Nidec D12E-24TS3 Motar BLDC
nidecD12e24ts3.description: Nidec D12E-24TS3 motar BLDC mai girman 12cm tana samar da iska mai shiga 83 CFM. Ƙananan aiki mai amo a 24VDC don aikace-aikacen sanyaya.

deltaBfb1224h.title: Delta Electronics BFB1224H Motar Shayarwa ta BLDC
deltaBfb1224h.description: Delta Electronics BFB1224H motar shayarwa ta BLDC mai girman 120mm. Ayyukan 24VDC tare da tsawon rayuwa na awanni 70,000 don amincin dogon lokaci.

orientalMa2308p.title: Oriental Motor MA-230-8P Motar Axial ta AC
orientalMa2308p.description: Oriental Motor MA-230-8P motar axial ta AC mai girman 80mm. Ayyukan 230VAC suna ba da iska mai yawa don samun iska ta masana'antu.

nidecG1238b.title: Nidec G1238B Motar BLDC ta Masana'antu
nidecG1238b.description: Nidec G1238B DC axial BLDC motar da aka ƙima a 38W. Girman 12cm tare da sarrafa gudu mai sauƙi don aikace-aikacen darajar masana'antu.

nidecGentletyphoonD1225c12.title: Nidec GentleTyphoon D1225C12 Motar Sanyaya Mai Tsitattun Sauti
nidecGentletyphoonD1225c12.description: Nidec GentleTyphoon D1225C12 BLDC motar sanyaya tana aiki a 1850 RPM tare da 12VDC. Aiki mai tsitattun sauti don sanyaya daidai.

orientalBle2m25s5.title: Oriental Motor BLE2M25S-5 BLDC Cooling Motor
orientalBle2m25s5.description: Oriental Motor BLE2M25S-5 BLDC motor with 25W capacity and speed control. 24VDC operation for cooling applications.

deltaAfb1212she.title: Delta Electronics AFB1212SHE Babban Motar BLDC Mai Ƙarfi
deltaAfb1212she.description: Delta Electronics AFB1212SHE motar BLDC mai girman 120mm. Ayyukan 12VDC tare da babban matsa lamba don buƙatun sanyaya.

nidecBetaVTa450dc.title: Nidec Beta V TA450DC Motar Sanyaya PWM
nidecBetaVTa450dc.description: Nidec Beta V TA450DC BLDC motar sanyaya tare da sarrafa PWM. Ayyukan 12VDC a 4500 RPM don babban aikin sanyaya.

orientalMf60Ac.title: Oriental Motor MF-60-AC Cross-Flow Motor
orientalMf60Ac.description: Oriental Motor MF-60-AC cross-flow motor tare da girman 60mm. Ayyukan 230VAC suna ba da rarraba iska daidai.

orientalMd8p48.title: Oriental Motor MD-8P48 BLDC Motar Samun Iska
orientalMd8p48.description: Oriental Motor MD-8P48 BLDC motar samun iska da aka ƙima a 48W tare da aikin 24VDC. Kariyar IP55 tana ba da har zuwa 883 CFM.

nidecG1751m.title: Nidec G1751M Babban Ƙarfin BLDC Motar Samun Iska
nidecG1751m.description: Nidec G1751M BLDC motar tare da girman 17cm da wutar lantarki 51W. Ayyukan 24VDC tare da babban ƙarfi da ƙarancin girgiza.

deltaBfb1512vh.title: Delta Electronics BFB1512VH BLDC Motar Samun Iska

orientalBmu23005.title: Oriental Motor BMU230-05 BLDC Rukunin Samun Iska
orientalBmu23005.description: Oriental Motor BMU230-05 BLDC rukunin motar tare da sarrafa gudu. Ayyukan 230VAC don aikace-aikacen samun iska.

nidecD08a12ts1.title: Nidec D08A-12TS1 Gano Gudu BLDC Motor
nidecD08a12ts1.description: Nidec D08A-12TS1 BLDC motar tare da girman 80mm da fitarwa mai bugun jini. Ayyukan 12VDC tare da ikon gano gudu.

grundfos10sq07200.title: Grundfos 10SQ07-200 Famfon Rijiyar da ke Ruwa
grundfos10sq07200.description: Grundfos 10SQ07-200 famfon rijiyar da ke ruwa yana ba da 10 GPM tare da motar 0.75 HP. 200 ft head capacity a 230V don zama da haske na kasuwanci.

franklin20fv1s4.title: Franklin 20FV1S4 Series V Famfon da ke Ruwa
franklin20fv1s4.description: Franklin 20FV1S4 Series V famfon da ke ruwa tare da ƙarfin 20 GPM. Gina bakin karfe 1 HP don aikace-aikacen 230V.

grundfosSp307.title: Grundfos SP30-7 Famfon Masana'antu da ke Ruwa
grundfosSp307.description: Grundfos SP30-7 famfon masana'antu da ke ruwa tare da diamita inci 4. Kwarara 30 GPM tare da motar 7 HP don aikace-aikacen matakai 3 na 460V.

franklin500sts50d6.title: Franklin 500STS50D6 STS Turbine Pump
franklin500sts50d6.description: Franklin 500STS50D6 STS turbine pump tare da diamita inci 6. Babban ƙarfin 500 GPM tare da motar 50 HP don aikace-aikacen masana'antu 460V.

grundfosSqe15290.title: Grundfos SQE15-290 Smart Famfon da ke Ruwa
grundfosSqe15290.description: Grundfos SQE15-290 smart famfon da ke ruwa tare da VFD da aka gina a ciki. Ƙarfin 15 GPM tare da motar 1.5 HP da 290 ft head.

fluke325.description: Fluke 325 mita matsa lamba na gaskiya-RMS yana auna har zuwa 400A AC da 600V AC/DC. CAT IV 300V ƙimar aminci don gyara matsalar lantarki.

kyoritsu2046r.title: Kyoritsu 2046R Mita Matsa Lamba na Gaskiya-RMS
kyoritsu2046r.description: Kyoritsu 2046R mita matsa lamba na gaskiya-RMS tare da ƙarfin 600A AC/DC. Bude muƙamuƙi 33mm tare da ƙimar CAT IV don amfanin masana'antu.

hiokiCm4373.title: Hioki CM4373 AC/DC Mita Matsa Lamba na Wutar Lantarki

keysight34461a.title: Keysight 34461A Truevolt 6.5-Digit DMM

keithleyDmm7510.title: Keithley DMM7510 7.5-Digit Digitizing Multimeter
keithleyDmm7510.description: Keithley DMM7510 madaidaicin digitizing multimeter 7.5-digit tare da ƙimar samfurin 1 Msample/s, hulɗar fuskar tabawa, da 1pA/1μΩ hankali don aikace-aikacen bincike.

keithleyDmm6500.title: Keithley DMM6500 6.5-Digit Graphical Multimeter
keithleyDmm6500.description: Keithley DMM6500 yana fasalta ƙudurin 6.5-digit, nunin fuskar tabawa mai hoto, tallafin shirye-shiryen Python/TSP, da ayyukan aunawa 15 don gwaji mai yawa.

keysight34450a.title: Keysight 34450A 5.5-Digit Dual Display DMM
keysight34450a.description: Keysight 34450A yana ba da ƙudurin 5.5-digit tare da daidaiton 0.015% DCV, karatun 190/s, nunin OLED, da ƙwaƙwalwar ajiya 50K don auna benci mai inganci.

schneiderIon9000.description: Schneider ION9000 mita ingancin wutar lantarki ce mai ƙima tare da aji daidaito 0.05%, auna madaidaici biyu, da bin diddigin tashin hankali mai zurfi don kulawa mai mahimmanci.

Samun dama ga wurare masu tsauri
